archimate:Deliverable.name: Blueprint for Identity and Access Governance service
archimate:Deliverable.documentation: - Access request and approval processes which enables users to request access to assets and provide a mechanism to approve/deny based on role/permissions - Access Review processes for allowing regular review of the users access to ensure access is still valid. - Provisioning/deprovisiong access allowing CRUD or user accounts and assignment of permissions to privileged users - IAM Policy management defining for example password strenght, need for MFA etc - Reporting allowing to fetch out reports and analytics to enhance processes
